item.title: Assessing Social Inequality and Lockdown Policies using Mobile Location Data in Indonesia
item.description: Challenge: Lockdown policies such as stay-at-home orders and non-essential business closures are central to fighting the novel coronavirus.

item.title: How to Find Population Movement Data for Your Country: The Mobile Location Data Inventory
item.description: As the COVID-19 pandemic continues, so have measures to mitigate its spread.
